children: is not a field of ArrayPartition
Define a new species of projection operator for this type:

Gradient from iteration will be e.g. Vector, this makes it another AbstractMatrix (::ChainRulesCore.ProjectTo)(dx::AbstractVector) = VectorOfArray(dx) Gradient from broadcasting will be another AbstractArray (::ChainRulesCore.ProjectTo)(dx::AbstractArray) = dx These rules duplicate the
methods above, because Zygote looks for an
definition first, and finds its own before finding those.
